title: Multi-period optimization of hydrogen refueling station layouts considering refueling satisfaction and hydrogen fuel cell vehicle market diffusion
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01627G, Paper
Yan Zhou, Xunpeng Qin, Wenlong Yang
The strategic site selection of hydrogen refueling stations (HRSs) in the network and user satisfaction mutually influence each other, presenting a typical bilevel planning problem for optimizing the hydrogen refueling network.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
